name: Multiplayer Shooter FPS
description:
Multiplayer Shooter FPS is an advanced multiplayer first-person shooter game. You have three different game modes in the core of the kit: Free for All, Team Death Match, and Capture the Flag. There are four player classes and seven different kinds of weapons: Rifle, Sniper, Shotgun, Pistol, Grenade, Launcher, and Knife.

Three different game modes:

  • Free for All
  • Team Death Match
  • Capture the Flag

Seven different kinds of weapons:

  • Rifle
  • Sniper
  • Shotgun
  • Pistol
  • Grenade
  • Launcher
  • Knife

Feature List:

  • 3 Game modes: Team Deathmatch, Free For All, and Capture of Flag, and 4 more optional: Demolition, Elimination, Cover Point, and Gun Race.
  • Team Voice chat.
  • Private and Public matches.
  • Player Classes, 4 kinds of players classes with different load-outs (Assault, Engineer, Support, Recon)
  • 8 different types of weapons: Rifle, Sniper, Shotgun, Pistol, Grenade, Molotov, Grenade Launcher, and Knife.
  • Slide, Jump, Crouch, and Run player movement.
  • Friend List.
  • Pre-Match Lobby.
  • Lobby chat
  • Team selection and Auto-Team selection
  • and much more
